introSection.leftTitle: Gujranwala’s Leading Enterprises, United Under One Alliance
introSection.rightText: At the core of the Gujranwala Business Alliance is a strong community of over 500 member companies united by a common purpose — to grow, innovate, and lead. Our members represent every major industrial sector of Gujranwala, from engineering and ceramics to textiles, IT, and manufacturing. Through GBA, members gain access to exclusive international networking opportunities, policy advocacy, trade facilitation, and collaborative projects that drive business expansion. The Alliance serves as both a voice and a platform for its members, helping them engage with global partners, influence industry policies, and shape the future of regional commerce.
